title: What Horror Movie is this? - Quora

response.answer_text: I googled “movies about demons 1988”, and here is what google recommended: Night of DemonsDream DemonSorority Babes in the Slimeball Bowl-O-RamaBlack RosesHellbound: Hellraiser IIThe OgreThe UnholyCellar DwellerThe UnnamableRabid GranniesPoltergeist IIIThis is ranked based on relevance and maybe on how popular in general or how popular they are on users who search using the google engine. I suggest you search the trailers for these movies in YouTube. If it’s still isn’t here on the list, it might be that your movie was not that popular, or not even remotely remarkable to begin with so as not to even register on Google’s first search results page.

This is an extremely broad question; it's like asking a bookstore clerk to identify a specific book where someone dies. If you could recount some of the plot points, that would help in identifying the movie. The two obvious ones are:Night of the Demons (1988)Dream Demon (1988) Even if they're not what you're looking for, you might find something worth watching!
